channel.title: My friend needs help with his new server
channel.description: my friend has made a new server but he is the only one allowed to log into it also he has aksed me to ask you people out there in the world for some codes to help him edit it if he ever finds out how to make other people log onto it :confused:

item.title: My friend needs help with his new server
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

tell your friend to try and just open the port. go to his firewall settings then exceptions, new, then for the name put is rsps and the port put 43594 then save/ok it.

this is what i did when i had my old router and it worked fine.

Read full topic
item.source: My friend needs help with his new server

item.title: My friend needs help with his new server
item.dc:creator: @wat72 wat72
item.description:
@wat72 wrote:

[quote=“xXVVarGodXx, post:13, topic:260536”]Ya But after i get to PortForward.com What do i do ? What do i click on ??? [/quote]You should stick to playing servers if you don’t even know how to portforward when there is portforward.com AND tutorials in the tutorial section of these forums.

Read full topic

item.title: My friend needs help with his new server
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:8, topic:260536”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=344034.msg2655942#msg2655942 date=1233870835]
there is plenty of tuts. even one stickyed.

shows ur lazy…
[/quote]

Like how your to lazy to spell out your word’s and use proper grammar?

On topic:
You could always use “portforward.com” it’s very useful if you don’t know the basics.[/quote]

wow who cares about grammar… as long as you know what hes saying who cares…
